name: personification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is a perfect example of something: She played a character who was the personification of evil. They were creators, builders, the personification of everything that is good about America.
literature
  specialized the act of giving a human quality or characteristic to something which is not human, or an example of this: Nemesis, in Greek mythology, is the personification of divine justice and the vengeance of the gods. In the scriptures, there is a very strong personification of wisdom as feminine. See
personify
More examplesFewer examplesHe was the personification of courage with all the illnesses he went through.He spent a long time talking frankly to journalists and being the personification of charm itself.Their emperor was meant to be the personification of the sun.
